data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/4cVWQvHupI3jlSricUUdMeA4y8h.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":0,"genres":[{"id":99,"name":"Documentary"},{"id":36,"name":"History"}],"homepage":"","id":42044,"imdb_id":"tt0090015","origin_country":["FR"],"original_language":"fr","original_title":"Shoah","overview":"Director Claude Lanzmann spent 11 years on this sprawling documentary about the Holocaust, conducting his own interviews and refusing to use a single frame of archival footage. Dividing Holocaust witnesses into three categories – survivors, bystanders, and perpetrators – Lanzmann presents testimonies from survivors of the Chelmno concentration camp, an Auschwitz escapee, and witnesses of the Warsaw Ghetto Uprising, as well as a chilling report of gas chambers from an SS officer at Treblinka.","popularity":13.252,"poster_path":"/yvwF7dfSCybFcBOklUzKpE46bHM.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":75643,"logo_path":null,"name":"Historia","origin_country":""},{"id":75642,"logo_path":null,"name":"Les Films Aleph","origin_country":""},{"id":10901,"logo_path":"/8dNHWgUlJNz9HHLtcdsz04jRtyi.png","name":"Ministère de la culture","origin_country":"FR"}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"FR","name":"France"}],"release_date":"1985-04-21","revenue":20175,"runtime":566,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"English","iso_639_1":"en","name":"English"},{"english_name":"French","iso_639_1":"fr","name":"Français"},{"english_name":"German","iso_639_1":"de","name":"Deutsch"},{"english_name":"Hebrew","iso_639_1":"he","name":"עִבְרִית"},{"english_name":"Polish","iso_639_1":"pl","name":"Polski"},{"english_name":"Yiddish","iso_639_1":"yi","name":""}],"status":"Released","tagline":"","title":"Shoah","video":false,"vote_average":8.282,"vote_count":186}
